data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Syunik, Armenia the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Syunik, Armenia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 141,800 souls in Syunik and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.prayer: Father, move the 13,016 believers in the state of Syunik to say "Not our will, but yours be done", like Jesus.
data.verse: He withdrew about a stone’s throw beyond them, knelt down and prayed, "Father, if you are willing, take this cup from me; yet not my will, but yours be done."

data.prayer: God, we ask you to raise up elders and deacons from the 13,016 believers in Syunik, who will serve the church and equip it to do your work.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up until we all reach unity in the faith and in the knowledge of the Son of God and become mature, attaining to the whole measure of the fullness of Christ.

data.prayer: Spirit, please convict each believer in Syunik, Armenia to take up their calling as a priesthood of believers and pray for the 128,784 lost around them.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Syunik, Armenia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Spirit, supernaturally prepare encounters with the gospel on sites like Facebook and Instagram for the 141,800 people living in Syunik.

data.section_summary:
the state of Syunik, Armenia has a population of 141,800.

We estimate Syunik has 13,016 people who might know Jesus, 118,096 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 10,688 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 10 neighbors who need Jesus.
